page.title: 05INDUSTRY IN N.CHERITON
page.content: PLESSEY MARINE LTD. There are 950 people working at Plessey's.Most of them live locally but some further a field like Yeovil, Salisbury or within a 20 mile radius. They mainly travel by company carsand about 150 of them travel by the firms own bus service called SPE.They also have companies all over Britain.Mostof the things they make are for other companies and also millitary uses like RADARS,SONAR systems and also micro chips.They also export their products to friendly nations like Americas navy.Most of the things they make big and small companies use everyday.They are also the largest employers in the area and they also send books and forms to universities for graduates in Science and technologhy.One of the big companies they send their products to is the BBC for their micro computers
